import { forwardRef, useImperativeHandle, useState } from "react" import { Button, Modal } from "semantic-ui-react" const CheckOutModal = forwardRef((props, ref) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) useImperativeHandle(ref, () => ({ open() { setOpen(true) }, })) return ( setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} trigger={} > Check Out <>
